description.zh-cn: 中国国民党内部的一个组织，核心人物多毕业于黄埔军校，强调“一个主义、一个政党、一个领袖”，推行对领袖蒋中正的个人崇拜，加强蒋中正嫡系对军队军官的思想控制。1938年宣布解散，成员大部加入三民主义青年团。
description.en: An organization within the Kuomintang, with its core members mostly being graduates of the Whampoa Military Academy. It emphasized "one doctrine, one party, one leader," promoted a personality cult around its leader Chiang Kai-shek, and strengthened the ideological control of Chiang's faction over military officers. It was dissolved in 1938, with most of its members joining the Three Principles of the People Youth Corps.

description.zh-cn: 中国的政党，中华民族复兴社是其内部的一个组织。
description.en: A Chinese political party, within which the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation was an organization.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的军事学校，其毕业生是中华民族复兴社的核心成员。
description.en: A military academy of the Republic of China whose graduates formed the core of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家及军事家，担任中华民族复兴社社长。
description.en: A politician and military leader of the Republic of China who served as the president of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation.

description.zh-cn: 指对某个在世的个人，通常是政治领袖的过度崇拜。中华民族复兴社曾推行对蒋中正的个人崇拜。
description.en: Refers to the excessive adoration of a living individual, usually a political leader. The Revival Society of the Chinese Nation promoted a personality cult around Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 由中华民族复兴社核心成员于1932年成立的内部组织。
description.en: An internal organization established in 1932 by the core members of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation.

description.zh-cn: 一种外交政策，主张国家应尽量避免与他国建立军事、政治或经济联盟和关系。第一次世界大战后美国奉行此政策，为苏日两国蚕食中国提供了机会。
description.en: A foreign policy advocating that a nation should avoid military, political, or economic alliances and relations with other countries. The United States pursued this policy after World War I, which provided an opportunity for the Soviet Union and Japan to encroach on China.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战后，成为苏联和日本瓜分和蚕食的目标地区之一。
description.en: After World War I, it became one of the target areas for division and encroachment by the Soviet Union and Japan.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战后，成为苏联和日本瓜分和蚕食的目标地区之一。
description.en: After World War I, it became one of the target areas for division and encroachment by the Soviet Union and Japan.

description.zh-cn: 1929年发生的中苏冲突事件。该事件的发生促进了中国青年民族主义的传播，并间接推动了中华民族复兴社的成立。
description.en: A Sino-Soviet conflict that occurred in 1929. The incident promoted the spread of nationalism among Chinese youth and indirectly contributed to the establishment of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation.

description.zh-cn: 1931年日本侵占中国东北的事件。该事件的发生促进了中国青年民族主义的传播，并间接推动了中华民族复兴社的成立。
description.en: The 1931 incident of the Japanese invasion of Northeast China. The event promoted the spread of nationalism among Chinese youth and indirectly contributed to the establishment of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation.

description.zh-cn: 指1912年至1949年间中华民国政府有效统治中国大陆的时期。中华民族复兴社在此期间成立。
description.en: Refers to the period from 1912 to 1949 when the government of the Republic of China effectively ruled mainland China. The Revival Society of the Chinese Nation was established during this time.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社的成立地点和总社所在地。
description.en: The founding place and headquarters location of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社核心成员，“十三太保”之一，负责政训系统，并参与建立了三民主义力行社。
description.en: A core member of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation, one of the "Thirteen Taibao," responsible for the political training system, and participated in establishing the Three Principles of the People Vigorous Practice Society.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社核心成员，“十三太保”之一。
description.en: A core member of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation, one of the "Thirteen Taibao."

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社核心成员，“十三太保”之一。
description.en: A core member of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation, one of the "Thirteen Taibao."

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社核心成员，“十三太保”之一。
description.en: A core member of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation, one of the "Thirteen Taibao."

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社核心成员，“十三太保”之一，负责别动总队，并担任革命青年同志会书记。
description.en: A core member of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation, one of the "Thirteen Taibao," responsible for the Special Action Main Squad, and served as the secretary of the Revolutionary Youth Comrades Association.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社核心成员，“十三太保”之一，负责特务培训班和特务处，后者发展为军统。
description.en: A core member of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation, one of the "Thirteen Taibao," responsible for the secret agent training classes and the Secret Service Department, which later developed into the Bureau of Investigation and Statistics (Juntong).

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社核心成员，“十三太保”之一，与戴笠共同负责特务培训班。
description.en: A core member of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation, one of the "Thirteen Taibao," jointly responsible for the secret agent training classes with Dai Li.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社的外围组织，以黄埔军校学员为主。
description.en: A peripheral organization of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation, mainly composed of cadets from the Whampoa Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 担任革命军人同志会书记。
description.en: Served as the secretary of the Revolutionary Military Comrades Association.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社的外围组织，以其他学校学员为主。
description.en: A peripheral organization of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation, mainly composed of students from other schools.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社设立的行动组织，由康泽负责。
description.en: An action organization established by the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation, led by Kang Ze.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社于1934年建立的外围组织。
description.en: A peripheral organization established by the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation in 1934.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社成员，负责宪警训练班。
description.en: A member of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation, responsible for the gendarmerie and police training classes.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社成员，主持军委会政训班。
description.en: A member of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation, who presided over the political training classes of the Military Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国传统社会中的秘密社会组织。中华民族复兴社设立忠勇救国会以影响其成员。
description.en: Secret societies in traditional Chinese society. The Revival Society of the Chinese Nation established the Loyal and Brave National Salvation Society to influence its members.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社于1933年后设立的，针对帮会成员的组织。
description.en: An organization established by the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation after 1933, targeting members of secret societies.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社设立的组织，后因与CC派的矛盾而被迫解散。
description.en: An organization established by the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation, which was later forced to dissolve due to conflicts with the CC Clique.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社出版的杂志之一。
description.en: One of the magazines published by the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社出版的杂志之一。
description.en: One of the magazines published by the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党内部的政治派系，与中华民族复兴社发生矛盾。
description.en: A political faction within the Kuomintang that came into conflict with the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社的活动系统之一，由戴笠负责，后发展成为军统。
description.en: One of the operational systems of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation, led by Dai Li, which later developed into the Bureau of Investigation and Statistics (Juntong).

description.zh-cn: 国民政府军事委员会调查统计局的简称，由复兴社的特务处发展而来。
description.en: Abbreviation for the Bureau of Investigation and Statistics of the National Military Council, which evolved from the Secret Service Department of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation.

description.zh-cn: 1938年成立的组织，吸收了中华民族复兴社解散后的大部分成员。
description.en: An organization established in 1938 that absorbed most of the members of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation after its dissolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社是中国国民党内部的一个组织。
description.en: The Revival Society of the Chinese Nation was an organization within the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正亲自担任中华民族复兴社社长。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek personally served as the president of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社推行对领袖蒋中正的个人崇拜。
description.en: The Revival Society of the Chinese Nation promoted a personality cult around its leader Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 1929年的中东路事件发生后，民族主义在中国青年学生中加速传播，促使中国国民党决定成立复兴社以组织和引导青年。
description.en: After the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929, nationalism spread rapidly among Chinese youth, prompting the Kuomintang to decide to establish the Revival Society to organize and guide them.

description.zh-cn: 1931年的九一八事变发生后，民族主义在中国青年学生中加速传播，促使中国国民党决定成立复兴社以组织和引导青年。
description.en: After the Mukden Incident in 1931, nationalism spread rapidly among Chinese youth, prompting the Kuomintang to decide to establish the Revival Society to organize and guide them.

position.zh-cn: 干事会成员、政训系统负责人
position.en: Board Member, Head of the Political Training System

description.zh-cn: 贺衷寒是复兴社干事会主要成员（“十三太保”之一），并负责其政训系统。
description.en: He Zhonghan was a main member of the Revival Society's board of directors (one of the "Thirteen Taibao") and was in charge of its political training system.

description.zh-cn: 桂永清是复兴社干事会主要成员（“十三太保”之一）。
description.en: Gui Yongqing was a main member of the Revival Society's board of directors (one of the "Thirteen Taibao").

description.zh-cn: 萧赞育是复兴社干事会主要成员（“十三太保”之一）。
description.en: Xiao Zanyu was a main member of the Revival Society's board of directors (one of the "Thirteen Taibao").

description.zh-cn: 滕杰是复兴社干事会主要成员（“十三太保”之一）。
description.en: Teng Jie was a main member of the Revival Society's board of directors (one of the "Thirteen Taibao").

position.zh-cn: 干事会成员、别动总队负责人
position.en: Board Member, Head of the Special Action Main Squad

description.zh-cn: 康泽是复兴社干事会主要成员（“十三太保”之一），并负责其行动组织“别动总队”。
description.en: Kang Ze was a main member of the Revival Society's board of directors (one of the "Thirteen Taibao") and was in charge of its action organization, the "Special Action Main Squad."

position.zh-cn: 干事会成员、特务培训班负责人、特务处负责人
position.en: Board Member, Head of Secret Agent Training Classes, Head of the Secret Service Department

description.zh-cn: 戴笠是复兴社干事会主要成员（“十三太保”之一），负责特务培训班和特务处。
description.en: Dai Li was a main member of the Revival Society's board of directors (one of the "Thirteen Taibao"), responsible for the secret agent training classes and the Secret Service Department.

position.zh-cn: 干事会成员、特务培训班负责人
position.en: Board Member, Head of Secret Agent Training Classes

description.zh-cn: 郑介民是复兴社干事会主要成员（“十三太保”之一），并与戴笠共同负责特务培训班。
description.en: Zheng Jiemin was a main member of the Revival Society's board of directors (one of the "Thirteen Taibao") and was jointly responsible for the secret agent training classes with Dai Li.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社的核心人物多毕业于黄埔军校，贺衷寒是其核心成员之一。
description.en: The core figures of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation were mostly graduates of the Whampoa Military Academy, and He Zhonghan was one of its core members.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社的核心人物多毕业于黄埔军校，桂永清是其核心成员之一。
description.en: The core figures of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation were mostly graduates of the Whampoa Military Academy, and Gui Yongqing was one of its core members.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社的核心人物多毕业于黄埔军校，萧赞育是其核心成员之一。
description.en: The core figures of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation were mostly graduates of the Whampoa Military Academy, and Xiao Zanyu was one of its core members.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社的核心人物多毕业于黄埔军校，滕杰是其核心成员之一。
description.en: The core figures of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation were mostly graduates of the Whampoa Military Academy, and Teng Jie was one of its core members.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社的核心人物多毕业于黄埔军校，康泽是其核心成员之一。
description.en: The core figures of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation were mostly graduates of the Whampoa Military Academy, and Kang Ze was one of its core members.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社的核心人物多毕业于黄埔军校，戴笠是其核心成员之一。
description.en: The core figures of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation were mostly graduates of the Whampoa Military Academy, and Dai Li was one of its core members.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社的核心人物多毕业于黄埔军校，郑介民是其核心成员之一。
description.en: The core figures of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation were mostly graduates of the Whampoa Military Academy, and Zheng Jiemin was one of its core members.

description.zh-cn: 1932年，复兴社的核心成员贺衷寒等人建立了内部组织三民主义力行社。
description.en: In 1932, core members of the Revival Society, including He Zhonghan, established the internal organization Three Principles of the People Vigorous Practice Society.

description.zh-cn: 三民主义力行社是中华民族复兴社的内部组织。
description.en: The Three Principles of the People Vigorous Practice Society was an internal organization of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation.

description.zh-cn: 革命军人同志会是中华民族复兴社的外围组织。
description.en: The Revolutionary Military Comrades Association was a peripheral organization of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation.

description.zh-cn: 潘佑强担任革命军人同志会的书记。
description.en: Pan Youqiang served as the secretary of the Revolutionary Military Comrades Association.

description.zh-cn: 革命青年同志会是中华民族复兴社的外围组织。
description.en: The Revolutionary Youth Comrades Association was a peripheral organization of the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation.

description.zh-cn: 康泽担任革命青年同志会的书记。
description.en: Kang Ze served as the secretary of the Revolutionary Youth Comrades Association.

description.zh-cn: 别动总队是中华民族复兴社设立的行动组织。
description.en: The Special Action Main Squad was an action organization established by the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation.

description.zh-cn: 1934年，中华民族复兴社建立了一个外围组织——忠义救国会。
description.en: In 1934, the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation established a peripheral organization, the Loyal and Righteous National Salvation Society.

position.en: Head of Gendarmerie and Police Training Classes

description.zh-cn: 孙常钧负责中华民族复兴社开设的宪警训练班。
description.en: Sun Changjun was in charge of the gendarmerie and police training classes run by the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation.

position.en: Host of the Military Affairs Commission's Political Training Classes

description.zh-cn: 刘健群主持中华民族复兴社开设的军委会政训班。
description.en: Liu Jianqun presided over the political training classes of the Military Affairs Commission run by the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation.

description.zh-cn: 1933年后，复兴社设立了针对帮会成员的忠勇救国会。
description.en: After 1933, the Revival Society established the Loyal and Brave National Salvation Society, targeting members of secret societies.

description.zh-cn: 1933年后，复兴社设立了中国文化学会以扩大影响。
description.en: After 1933, the Revival Society established the Chinese Culture Society to expand its influence.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社出版了《中国革命》杂志。
description.en: The Revival Society of the Chinese Nation published the magazine 'Chinese Revolution'.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族复兴社出版了《前途》杂志。
description.en: The Revival Society of the Chinese Nation published the magazine 'Future'.

description.zh-cn: 复兴社成立后不久，便与CC派发生矛盾。
description.en: Shortly after its establishment, the Revival Society came into conflict with the CC Clique.

description.zh-cn: 由于与CC派的矛盾，复兴社被迫退出文化教育领域。
description.en: Due to conflicts with the CC Clique, the Revival Society was forced to withdraw from the cultural and educational fields.

description.zh-cn: 因与CC派的矛盾，中华民族复兴社解散了其设立的中国文化学会。
description.en: Due to conflicts with the CC Clique, the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation dissolved the Chinese Culture Society it had established.

description.zh-cn: 特务处是复兴社的三个主要活动系统之一，由戴笠负责。
description.en: The Secret Service Department was one of the three main operational systems of the Revival Society, led by Dai Li.

description.zh-cn: 复兴社的特务处后来发展成为军统。
description.en: The Secret Service Department of the Revival Society later developed into the Juntong (Bureau of Investigation and Statistics).

description.zh-cn: 1938年，中华民族复兴社宣布解散，其成员大部加入新成立的三民主义青年团。
description.en: In 1938, the Revival Society of the Chinese Nation announced its dissolution, and the majority of its members joined the newly established Three Principles of the People Youth Corps.
